name: project-intake-template
description: GitHub template repository with automated project setup system

scripts.lint: echo 'No linting configured. Add ESLint to your project and update this script.'
scripts.format:check: echo 'No formatting check configured. Add Prettier to your project and update this script.'
scripts.typecheck: echo 'No type checking configured. Add TypeScript to your project and update this script.'
scripts.test: echo 'No tests configured. Add a test framework to your project and update this script.'
scripts.test:e2e: echo 'No E2E tests configured. Add Playwright or Cypress to your project and update this script.'
scripts.build: echo 'No build configured. Add build tools to your project and update this script.'

author: Andrew Tucker + Claude Code
